title: In this nematode species males are needed for reproduction but not their genes

title_detail.value: In this nematode species males are needed for reproduction but not their genes

summary: In the Mesorhabditis belari roundworm, the sole purpose of males is to help females produce clones of themselves.

summary_detail.value: In the Mesorhabditis belari roundworm, the sole purpose of males is to help females produce clones of themselves.
